c:complexType.c:documentation: The options documentation class of the Metric Dot (XY Scatter) chart.

c:property.name: scatter
c:property.c:documentation: The metric point plot is the main plot of the metric dot chart, which means that its properties may be used without the "scatter" property suffix.
